Package it.polimi.ingsw.View.GUI.EventListeners

Class CharacterCardListener

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Observer.Subjects.ViewSubject
it.polimi.ingsw.View.GUI.EventListeners.CharacterCardListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
MouseListener, EventListener
public class CharacterCardListener extends ViewSubject implements MouseListener
MouseListener added to the CharacterCardPanels in order for the player to choose one to play.

  • Constructor Details

    • CharacterCardListener

      public CharacterCardListener(ArrayList<ViewObserver> viewObserverList, int characterID, int playerID, TableCenterPanel tableCenterPanel, GameScreenPanel gameScreenPanel)
      Constructor of CharacterCardListener.
      Parameters:
      viewObserverList - Array list of ViewObserver used to attach to this listener the GUI observers.
      characterID - Identifier of the character card associated with this listener.
      playerID - Identifier of the player id currently playing.
      tableCenterPanel - TableCenterPanel reference used to remove listeners from character cards, clouds and isles once a valid click is detected.
      gameScreenPanel - GameScreenPanel reference used to remove listeners from the dashboard once a click is detected.
